Powerful Features for Productive Teams

Everything you need to manage tasks, communicate with your team, track attendance, and analyze performance - all in one beautiful platform.

Task Management

Create, assign, and organize tasks with priorities, due dates, and detailed descriptions. Support for multi-location tasks and remote task flags.

  • Priority levels
  • Due date tracking
  • Multi-location tasks
  • Remote task flag

Team Collaboration

Work together seamlessly. Assign tasks to team members, add observers, and enable viewer approval flows.

  • Task assignment
  • Observer mode
  • Viewer approval flow
  • Role-based access

Recurring Tasks

Automate repetitive work with recurring tasks. Set daily, weekly, monthly, or quarterly schedules with full completion history.

  • Daily recurrence
  • Weekly schedules
  • Monthly tasks
  • Completion history

Team Chat

Real-time direct and group messaging built right into the platform. Share files, discuss tasks, and keep communication in one place.

  • Direct messaging
  • Group channels
  • File sharing
  • Real-time updates

Attendance Tracking

GPS-based attendance with configurable geofencing. Track check-ins, check-outs, and generate attendance reports automatically.

  • GPS geofencing
  • Check-in/out logs
  • Late tracking
  • Admin settings

Analytics Dashboard

Track productivity with detailed reports. View task completion rates, employee performance scores, and monthly trends.

  • Completion rates
  • Performance scores
  • Trend analysis
  • Export reports

Enterprise Security

Multi-tenant architecture with complete data isolation. Your data is safe and separate from other companies.

  • Data isolation
  • Secure access
  • Role permissions
  • Subscription control

Salary & Leave Management

Define salary structures, manage leave policies, and automate salary calculations. Everything HR needs in one place.

  • Salary structures
  • Leave policies
  • Auto calculation
  • Leave requests

Ready to Get Started?
